- Execute patch scripts chroot to the installed system. (bnc #456795) - revision 11908

- Remove obsolete zypp.conf::productsdir and deprecate ZConfig::productsPath(). - Monitor /etc/products.d to determine if @system.solv needs to be rebuilt. (bnc #457933) - revision 11923 - version 5.24.7 (23)
- Catch and report media errors when proving packages. (bnc #457652) - revision 11926

- Add str::hexencode and str::hexdecode to encode special characters in a string as %%XX. - Hexdecode modalias strings in rpm dependencies because rpm does not allow comma, blank and other special chars. (bnc #456695) - revision 11927
- Add Package::filelist, faster and less memory consuming implementation of Package::filenames (now deprecated). - revision 11949
- Fixed lost user request to abort during commit. (bnc #388810, bnc #450273) - revision 11954 - version 5.25.0 (23)
- handle HTTP 503 reponses as temporary errors (bnc #462545)
- Tell satsolver about product buddies (bnc #466565)
- Fix handling of plaindir repos on mounted devices (e.g. USB) (bnc #464778) - Fix plaindir checksum computation not to to follow symlinks (bnc #464778)
- Let vendor checks per default differ between 'openSUSE Build Service' and 'openSUSE' (bnc #467262).
- Enabled CredentialManager for MediaSMB (bnc #460970). - Ignore URL's username, password, and query string in AuthData comparator in CredentialManager.
- Respect content-file DATDIR when downloading packages. (bnc #468612)
- HistoryLogReader added
- Add missing translations (bnc #256289)
- Send any output from rpm install/delete scripts via callback, so applications are able to display it. (bnc #369450)
- Fix installation prompting for the wrong CD/DVD. (bnc #472892)
- Follow IEC and use the binary prefixes (KiB,MiB,GiB) for printing Byte counts based on a power of 1024 (formerly just K,M,G). Byte counts based on a power of 1000 stay unaffected (kB,MB,GB).
- Fixed FTP authentication (bnc #472879)
- Compute obsoletes based on names only (not considering provides) (bnc #471023)
- Neither lose packages with empty name, nor SEGV when processing them. (bnc #470011)
- MediaAria2c: allow disabling aria2 using ZYPP_ARIA2C=0. Various improvements including file existence checking Disable HEAD request if aria2c >= 1.20 Restrict max connections to 2 for now.

Implemented the following options with aria backend: - download.max_concurrent_connections (default 2) download.min_download_speed (default no limit) download.max_download_speed (default no limit) download.max_silent_tries (default 5)
- Never refresh repositories from CD/DVD, once they are created. (bnc #476429)
- Prevent ResStatus from overriding user locks. (bnc #475230)
- Use correct default for zconfig(solver.checkSystemFile) (bnc# 475144)
- Make sure Fetcher pass optional files as non-interactive - Fixes file does not exist error when key/sig does not exist - version 6.2.0 (2)
- Adapt to changed satsolver API.

- aria2: implement speed indicators (bnc#475506) - aria2: implement progress indicators correctly (bnc#473846) - aria2: fix broken pipe when looking for aria2c which caused a fallback to curl. (bnc#480930) - aria2: implement saving and reading mirror stats data in /var/cache/zypp/aria2.stats - aria2: handle failover correctly (bnc#481115) - aria2: various improvements in error and report handling - aria2: curl: reset settings on attach to avoid duplicate headers - version 6.2.1 (2)
- zypp.conf: fixed and enabled 'servicesdir'
- Remove a lock if the locking process is in zombie state. (bnc #481577)
- aria2: show the download speed in the right unit - aria2: show the filename in progress, not the repository - aria2: don't show done twice
- Add Resolver::setSolveSrcPackages. Per default disable solving of source package dependencies. We will later allow to enable it per package. - version 6.3.0 (2)
- New zypp.conf option 'download.media_preference': Hint which media to prefer when installing packages (download vs. CD). - version 6.4.0 (2)
- Soft lock packages deleted on behalf of a user request. - version 6.4.1 (2)

- New classes wraping satsolver datamatcher (Match and sat::AttrMatcher) - Extend LookupAttr to support matching specific string patterns. - Rewrote PoolQuery::Iterator (adapt to AttrMatcher, fixes and speedup) - version 6.5.0 (5)
- In update repos providing multiple release package versions for the same product, link a product to the latest version. (bnc #497696)
- Improve problem report on broken systemCheck rule (bnc #475144)
- Detect and compile with rpm 4.7 (bnc #444211) - version 6.5.2 (5)
- Allow service refresh to change a repositories url (bnc #502157)
- Fix lost housekeeping data in modifyRepo (bnc #503207)
- New solver.allowVendorChange expert option in zypp.conf. - version 6.6.0 (6)
- Improve PoolQuery to allow queries on dependencies. (bnc #475682) - version 6.7.0 (6)
- Cleanup and remove deprecated interface methods. - version 6.8.0 (8)
- Fix solver to use IdSting to avoid failing vendor checks. - version 6.8.1 (8)
- Allow building libzypp without HAL (not recommended). Without HAL CD/DVD device detection is limited to /dev/dvd and /dev/cdrom. - version 6.8.2 (8)
- Allow building libzypp with rpm-5 (experimental) - version 6.8.3 (8)

- Enhance PoolQueryIterator to allow detailed inspection of attribute matches. - Prefer datadir stored as repo attribute, but fallback searching in solvbales (old solv files do this). - version 6.9.0 (8)
- Enhance LookupAttr to allow direct query of attributes within sub-structures (flexarrays).
- Running as non-root user use a temporary @System solvfile in case the global one is outdated and needed refresh. (bnc #517183) - version 6.9.1 (8)
- Support PoolQuery for sub-structures attributes. (fate #305503) - version 6.9.2 (8)
- Adapt to satsolvers improved dataiterator handling. - version 6.9.3 (8)
- When unmounting ISO images, don't mix up exceptions thrown by the loop mounted ISO and those thrown by the media containing it. (bnc #517856)
- Fix parsing of rpm.install.excludedocs option (bnc #518883)
- Fix HistoryLog to initialize on demand. - version 6.10.0 (10)
- Remove obsolete UpgradeStatistics class from libzypp.
- Adapt to boost_unit_test_framework-1.38. - version 6.10.1 (10)

- Support "product version" detection on systems not using /etc/product.d/baseproduct by looking for the first package providing ZConfig::distroverpkg (defaults to redhat-release). - version 6.10.2 (10)
- log redirections when cURL media backend is used (fate #305320).
- Add new string Match::Mode STRINGSTART and STRINGEND.
- Don't write a solver testcase when solving for dist upgrade, but when actually committing. - version 6.10.3 (10)
- New solver.upgradeTestcasesToKeep option in zypp.conf. It tells how many dist upgrade solver testcases should be kept on the system. Per default just the last two are kept. - version 6.10.4 (10)

- add support to the package-manager script to use kpackagekit or gnome-packagekit if available, which allows to install local rpms with one click from file manager following desktop policies and fetching other dependencies if required. (fate #306526) - version 6.10.5 (10)
- Add download policies to ZYppCommitPolicy, supporting DownloadOnly and DownloadInAdvance. (fate #302159, fate #305624) - version 6.11.0 (11)
- New class InstanceId to build strings to identify/retrieve specific Solvables. - version 6.11.1 (11)
- New misc::defaultLoadSystem: Convenience to create the ZYpp instance and load target and enabled repositories.
- Create LogControl on demand instead of using a static var. (bnc #525339) - version 6.11.2 (11)
- Fixed parsing of download rate report (changed in aria2 1.4.0) (bnc #513944)
- Avoid deadlock after fork and failed exec. (bnc 493152) - No need to manually detect the location of aria2 binary. - version 6.11.4 (11)

- Remove confusing newlines in vendor change info (bnc #503859) - Removing a package lock was not counted as state change (bnc #501850) - Take solver_allowVendorChange option into account when computing the Selectables default candidate. - version 6.12.0 (11)
- New Resolver::addUpgradeRepo to perform a dist upgrade restricted to certain repositories. - version 6.13.0 (11)

- Provide class CheckAccessDeleted and command zypp-CheckAccessDeleted to check for running processes which access meanwhile deleted files or libraries. This may be used after commit, when trying to figure out which services need to be restated. (fate #300763). - version 6.13.1 (11)
- Tune CheckAccessDeleted to focus on libraries and executables. - version 6.13.2 (11)
- package-manager script: do not fail if kpackagekit is not installed (bnc #529510) - version 6.13.3 (11)
- package-manager script: Fall back to package selection if no packages are passed on the commandline. (bnc #529137)
- Fix PoolQuery comparison (bnc #528755) - Fix serialization and restore of predicated PoolQueries. - version 6.14.0 (11)
- Lock rpms architecture only on distupgrade of the running system. (bnc #458520) - version 6.14.2 (11)
- Fix resolution to force installation even if dependencies are missing. (bnc #531564) - Rephrase solver resolution to point out if a package will break. (bnc #520083)
- Add Capability::guessPackageSpec; parser also supporting "name-ver-rel.arch" formats for building Capabilities(originally "name.arch=ver-rel"). - version 6.14.3 (11)
- Support nfs4 (nfs4://... or nfs://...?type=nfs4) (fate #306451) - Added Url::schemeIsLocal, schemeIsRemote, schemeIsVolatile and schemeIsDownloading. - version 6.15.0 (11)
- New commit.downloadMode option in zypp.conf. Allows to set a prefered download policy for commit. - version 6.16.0 (11)
- Make sure rpmReadConfigFiles was called before using librpm (bnc #539603). - Remove dead rpm database caching code from class RpmDb. - version 6.17.0 (17)
- Add Selectable::updateCandidateObj returning the candidate for update, if there is one. The updateCandidate must not violate any active solver policy. - version 6.17.1 (17)
- Add zypp.conf option update.messages.notify: Command to be invoked to send update messages. (fate #301175) - version 6.17.2 (17)

- Return update messages via ZYppCommitResult. Support variable substitution in notification command. (fate #301175) - Fix evaluation of no_proxy entries (bnc #543337) - aria/curl: Fix header data in case the target is not initialized when downloading. - version 6.18.0 (17)

- Performing a dist upgrade the solver may try to delete old and no longer provided (dropped) packages, even if they do not cause any dependency problem. This behaviour may be trurned off via zypp.conf option solver.upgradeRemoveDropedPackages. (bnc #539543) - New zypp.conf option solver.upgradeRemoveDropedPackages (true). - Add Product::droplist: List of dropped packages, i.e. packages no longer provided by a product. - version 6.18.1 (17)

- aria2: pass credentials in a file instead of the command line which is logged. - aria2: we get the url in the progress if there is no response from the server yet, handle that to avoid flooding the log. - version 6.18.2 (17)

- ResStatus: add isOrphaned to test whether a package is not provided by any enabled repository. Orphaned packages are usually good candidates for cleanup unless the providing repository was intentionally disabled. - version 6.19.0 (19)
- Repository::setInfo: Propagate priority changes to the solver to avoid reloading the whole repo (bnc #498266). - version 6.19.1 (19)

- Credentials are passed as commandline options to aria2c, so strip any 'user@' from the URL. Otherwise aria will use an empty password for this URL and authentication will fail. (bnc #544634) - version 6.19.2 (19)
- Fixes to make libzypp-bindings compile. - version 6.19.3 (19)
- Add Resolver::upgradingRepo demanded by GUI. (bnc #548551) - version 6.20.0 (19)

- New class PoolItemBest: Find the best candidates e.g. in a PoolQuery result. ui::Selectabe enhancements. Both will aid applications to install package sets determined by query results. (bnc # 548392) - Fix upgradeRepo solution to keep obsolete packages. (bnc #550915) - Updated iso3166-1 country codes (bnc #531350) - version 6.21.0 (19)
- Don't try to use an empty proxy string. (bnc #551314) - MediaSMB failed to pass the --workgroup option to mount. (bnc #547354) - version 6.21.1 (19)
- Don't try to access droplist of dropped products. (bnc #551697) - version 6.21.2 (19)
- CheckAccessDeleted: Avoid reporting false positive due to insufficient permission.
- CIFS/SMB: Support mountoption 'noguest' to prevent passing 'guest' option to mount. "cifs://server/share/path?mountoptions=noguest,ro" (bnc #547354) - version 6.21.3 (19)
- Enhance interface for zypper. (bnc #551956) - version 6.21.4 (19)
- dup: Process drop list only if product actually changes. (bnc #552180) - Selectable: Consider allowed arch/noarch changes when comuting candiadates. - version 6.22.0 (19)
- Following https redirections requires at least libcurl4-7.19.4. (bnc #553895)
- CheckAccessDeleted: Per default do not collect and report deleted files that outside bin and lib directories. 'zypper ps' reporting false positive seems to confuse. (bnc #554480)

- Raised the limit of redirections from 3 to 6 (bnc #465532) - Following redirections also for https (bnc #545722). - Following https redirections requires at least libcurl4-7.19.4. (bnc #553895) - Do not report cached packages as being downloaded. (bnc #545295) - Per default do not collect and report deleted files outside bin and lib directories for 'zypper ps'. (bnc #554480) - version 6.22.1 (19)

- Forward port and document already present changes from Code11-Branch * void SEGV if trying to access data of installed packages, that were deleted behind our back (bnc #530595) * ProxyInfoSysconfig: take care variables get initialized. * Fix parsing of rpm.install.excludedocs option (bnc #518883) * Use rpm variables in specfile. (bnc #512466) * Fix to compile with -Werror=format-security * Fix packageand() in testcase generation * Don't link unneeded libraries. (bnc #490895) * Fix Patch::categoryEnum. * Adapt to changed satsolver API. (bnc #480303) * Taking ALL translations for generating GMO files (bnc #458739) * Advice users to contact NCC if access to a 'novell.com' repository is denied (bnc #464586). - version 6.22.2 (19)
- Specfile fixes to build on sle11-sp1. - Fix repository probing and building in presence of productdir. (bnc #553712) - version 6.22.3 (19)
- Parse zypp.conf multiversion option and make the setting available in pool and resolver. - version 6.23.0 (19)
- Add ui::Selecatble interface for picking specific package versions to install or delete if multiversion install is on. - version 6.24.0 (19)
- Fixed parsing of download speed from aria2c (bnc #537870)
- Fix chroot execution of update scripts. (bnc #558813) - version 6.24.3 (19)
- Also parse <product> tag from .prod files <upgrade> section. - version 6.24.3 (19)
- Add Selectable::highestAvailableVersionObj. Returns the highest available package version, ignoring priorities and policies. (bnc #557557) - version 6.25.0 (19)
- PickList and status interface for handling packages which are installable in multiple versions. (fate #305311) - version 6.26.0 (19)
- Don't allow an alias to start with '.' (bnc #473834)
- Improve multiversion status handling and installation. (fate #305311) - version 6.27.0 (19)
- Fix transaction building in presence of multiversion installable items. - version 6.27.1 (19)
- RepoInfoBase::label() added for use in UI messages, plus ZConfig::repoLabelIsAlias()
- Set SignatureFileChecker context even if the key is not known (bnc #495977) - version 6.28.0 (19)
- Use regex to parse aria2c progress lines (bnc #570917) - version 6.28.1 (19)
- Evaluate SolvAttr::repositoryToolVersion to prevent loading outdated solv files. (bnc #570623) - version 6.29.0 (19)
- Abort aria2c download when the progress callback receives 'false' (bnc #545106)

- Remember the enabled state of removed service repositories. This way we are able to restore service repositories correctly after a subscrition expired and gets renewed. (bnc #572634) - version 6.29.2 (19)
- Support an alternate SLE-SP1 translation set. - version 6.29.3 (19)
- Fix package-manager script wrongly escaping UTF-8 chars in path names (bnc #571410) - version 6.29.4 (19)
- On SLE aria2 is not required, so conflict with a too old aria2 version installed. (bnc #578052) - version 6.29.5 (19)
- RepoManager::cleanCacheDirGarbage added for removing directories which do not belong to any of known repos (bnc #467693) - version 6.30.0 (19)
- Turn off cookies when retrieving services repoindex.xml (bnc #573897) - Consider pending disable requests when removing service repositories. (bnc #572634) - version 6.30.1 (19)
- Made CURLE_PARTIAL_FILE an auto-retry error (bnc #471436)
- Check if a downloaded file actually exists even if aria2c returned 0. (bnc #564816) - version 6.30.3 (19)
- Avoiding use of 'guest' if 'credentials' is used when moutning a CIFS share. This caused 'permission denied' error with certain server configurations (bnc #560496).
- Fix handling of symlinked packages in package cache. (bnc #585409) - version 6.30.5 (19)
- Fix broken bit values in enum VendorSupportOption (bnc#589331) - version 6.31.0 (31)
- Add static Target::distributionLabel to return the baseproducts shortName and summary. Mainlu used for the bootloader menu. (bnc #586303) - version 6.31.1 (31)
- Fix guessing package spec to match package names only. (bnc#590864) - version 6.31.2 (31)
- Propagate ZConfig::setTextLocale to pool. (bnc#588850) - version 6.31.3 (31)
- Fix parsing port from IPv6 URL (bnc#593385)
- Using boost-1.42 requires -fno-strict-aliasing (bnc#595545) - Bump major version for 11.3 development. - version 7.0.0 (0)
- Provide name of the lock holder in ZYppFactoryException. (bnc#580513) - version 7.1.0 (1)
- /etc/zypp/locks: Allow to specify edition ranges with solvable:name and dependencies. - version 7.1.1 (1)
- Update translations.
- Update translations.
- Support URLs and ISOs ending on 'Media1', 'Media2', etc., when rewiting the URL to access a specific media number. By now only nanmes ending on 'CD' or 'DVD' were supported. (bnc#594850)
- Use libudev to detect available cd/dvd devices (bnc#590707,fate#308980) - Fix specfile to BuildRequire libudev-devel. - version 7.2.0 (2)
- Selectable: Classify broken but locked patch as isUnwanted (bnc#577118) - version 7.3.0 (2)
- Update translations.
- Enable splitprovides on update.
- Update translations.

- Cleanup when deleting packages. New zypp.conf expert option solver.cleandepsOnRemove telling whether the solver should per default try to remove packages exclusively required by the ones he's asked to delete (default false). - Resolver::cleandepsOnRemove API to allow applications to change the solver option. - version 7.4.0 (4)
- Update translations.
- Update translations.
- Improve solver.cleandepsOnRemove result by evaluating the install history to find packages installed on behalf of a user request (not auto added by the solver). - version 7.5.0 (5)
- Update translations.
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2 (Revision: 54959)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2 (Revision: 54959)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Add methods to evaluate gpg geys expiration dates. - Export all rpmDb keys to the zypp trusted keyring in one go. - version 7.6.0 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Fix package-manager-su to support LXDE (Andrea Florio) (bnc#582235) - Cleanup spec file (Pavol Rusnak) - version 7.6.0 (6)
- Fix arch detection on sprac (bug #566291) - Arch: add sparc64v and sparcv9v and armv7l - RepoManager: refresh repo if last refresh is in the future (bnc#593617) - version 7.6.1 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Fix packages provided via delta rpm being placed in the wrong package cache (bnc#607583) - version 7.7.1 (6)
- Fix broken IdStringType comparison (bnc#607572) - version 7.7.2 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Fix default evaluation of recommendations of installed packages (bnc#605490) - version 7.7.3 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Prevent against daemons launched in rpm %%post, that do not close their filedescriptors. Original fix was accidentally reverted. (bnc#174548) - version 7.7.4 (6)
- Add missing Date constant declarations. - version 7.7.5 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Don't bloat logfile by logging install progess values.
- Respect zypp.conf policy settings when solving for update.
- Fix CURLOPT_MAX_RECV_SPEED_LARGE expecting a curl_off_t argument.
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Fix requirement to /usr/bin/uuidgen (bnc#613304)
- Add PoolQuery for name, edition AND architecture in one go. (bnc#614362) - version 7.8.0 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Bump heads major version after 11.3 branched away. - version 8.0.0 (0)

- Fix bug in PoolQuery::addDependency - Disable MediaAria and enable MultiCurl as default http/ftp backend. MultiCurl implements MetaLink and Zsync support using libcurl. In case of trouble set ZYPP_MULTICURL=0 in the envirionment to disable the new backend. - version 8.0.1 (0)
- Enhance PoolItem interface to assist patch classification. (bnc#627316) - version 8.1.0 (0)
- Fix memory leaks.
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- MediaDISK: Use blkid to verify disk volumes. (bnc#623226) - version 8.1.1 (0)
- fix basearch url variable - use the right release package name on fedora
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Fix download-only not to omit source packages (bnc#635596) - version 8.1.2 (0)
- Report download failures in commit result (bnc#431854) - Fix Solvable::onSystemByUser returning true for uninstalled solvables. - version 8.1.3 (0)
- fixed replacing basearch (for fedora systems) - (bnc#637473) - version 8.2.0 (0)
- Allow per repository proxy settings like yum does. Including setting it to _none_ overriding the system proxy. Patch from Zhang, Qiang <qiang.z.zhang@intel.com> - version 8.2.1 (0)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- fix metalink4 parsing [bnc#641484]
- fixed replacing releasever (for fedora systems) - (bnc#637470) - version 8.3.0 (0)
- Use DownloadInHeaps as default, when there is nothing configured and when the target root is set to "/". (bnc#591476) - version 8.4.0 (4)
- implementation for url resolver plugins - version 8.5.0 (5)
- Don't use aria2c for FTP (bnc #641328)
- fix services not being linked to their file after being saved
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Use timeouts in plugin script communication. - Fix ExternalProgram to correctly remember exit status. - version 8.6.0 (5)
- Make MetaLinkParser accept InputStreams - Make MetaLinkParser accept Pathnames insted of strings - Fix MetaLinkv4 hash parsing - Add MetaLinkParser test - version 8.7.0 (7)
- Feed the ProvideFilePolicy progress callback in addition to any connected media::DownloadProgressReport (bnc#545106) - version 8.7.1 (7)
- added metalink support - version 8.8.0 (7)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Add two more arches armv7nhl and armv7hl

package.name: libzypp
package.changelog: - Adapt to changed satsolver API.

- aria2: implement speed indicators (bnc#475506) - aria2: implement progress indicators correctly (bnc#473846) - aria2: fix broken pipe when looking for aria2c which caused a fallback to curl. (bnc#480930) - aria2: implement saving and reading mirror stats data in /var/cache/zypp/aria2.stats - aria2: handle failover correctly (bnc#481115) - aria2: various improvements in error and report handling - aria2: curl: reset settings on attach to avoid duplicate headers - version 6.2.1 (2)
- zypp.conf: fixed and enabled 'servicesdir'
- Remove a lock if the locking process is in zombie state. (bnc #481577)
- aria2: show the download speed in the right unit - aria2: show the filename in progress, not the repository - aria2: don't show done twice
- Add Resolver::setSolveSrcPackages. Per default disable solving of source package dependencies. We will later allow to enable it per package. - version 6.3.0 (2)
- New zypp.conf option 'download.media_preference': Hint which media to prefer when installing packages (download vs. CD). - version 6.4.0 (2)
- Soft lock packages deleted on behalf of a user request. - version 6.4.1 (2)

- New classes wraping satsolver datamatcher (Match and sat::AttrMatcher) - Extend LookupAttr to support matching specific string patterns. - Rewrote PoolQuery::Iterator (adapt to AttrMatcher, fixes and speedup) - version 6.5.0 (5)
- In update repos providing multiple release package versions for the same product, link a product to the latest version. (bnc #497696)
- Improve problem report on broken systemCheck rule (bnc #475144)
- Detect and compile with rpm 4.7 (bnc #444211) - version 6.5.2 (5)
- Allow service refresh to change a repositories url (bnc #502157)
- Fix lost housekeeping data in modifyRepo (bnc #503207)
- New solver.allowVendorChange expert option in zypp.conf. - version 6.6.0 (6)
- Improve PoolQuery to allow queries on dependencies. (bnc #475682) - version 6.7.0 (6)
- Cleanup and remove deprecated interface methods. - version 6.8.0 (8)
- Fix solver to use IdSting to avoid failing vendor checks. - version 6.8.1 (8)
- Allow building libzypp without HAL (not recommended). Without HAL CD/DVD device detection is limited to /dev/dvd and /dev/cdrom. - version 6.8.2 (8)
- Allow building libzypp with rpm-5 (experimental) - version 6.8.3 (8)

- Enhance PoolQueryIterator to allow detailed inspection of attribute matches. - Prefer datadir stored as repo attribute, but fallback searching in solvbales (old solv files do this). - version 6.9.0 (8)
- Enhance LookupAttr to allow direct query of attributes within sub-structures (flexarrays).
- Running as non-root user use a temporary @System solvfile in case the global one is outdated and needed refresh. (bnc #517183) - version 6.9.1 (8)
- Support PoolQuery for sub-structures attributes. (fate #305503) - version 6.9.2 (8)
- Adapt to satsolvers improved dataiterator handling. - version 6.9.3 (8)
- When unmounting ISO images, don't mix up exceptions thrown by the loop mounted ISO and those thrown by the media containing it. (bnc #517856)
- Fix parsing of rpm.install.excludedocs option (bnc #518883)
- Fix HistoryLog to initialize on demand. - version 6.10.0 (10)
- Remove obsolete UpgradeStatistics class from libzypp.
- Adapt to boost_unit_test_framework-1.38. - version 6.10.1 (10)

- Support "product version" detection on systems not using /etc/product.d/baseproduct by looking for the first package providing ZConfig::distroverpkg (defaults to redhat-release). - version 6.10.2 (10)
- log redirections when cURL media backend is used (fate #305320).
- Add new string Match::Mode STRINGSTART and STRINGEND.
- Don't write a solver testcase when solving for dist upgrade, but when actually committing. - version 6.10.3 (10)
- New solver.upgradeTestcasesToKeep option in zypp.conf. It tells how many dist upgrade solver testcases should be kept on the system. Per default just the last two are kept. - version 6.10.4 (10)

- add support to the package-manager script to use kpackagekit or gnome-packagekit if available, which allows to install local rpms with one click from file manager following desktop policies and fetching other dependencies if required. (fate #306526) - version 6.10.5 (10)
- Add download policies to ZYppCommitPolicy, supporting DownloadOnly and DownloadInAdvance. (fate #302159, fate #305624) - version 6.11.0 (11)
- New class InstanceId to build strings to identify/retrieve specific Solvables. - version 6.11.1 (11)
- New misc::defaultLoadSystem: Convenience to create the ZYpp instance and load target and enabled repositories.
- Create LogControl on demand instead of using a static var. (bnc #525339) - version 6.11.2 (11)
- Fixed parsing of download rate report (changed in aria2 1.4.0) (bnc #513944)
- Avoid deadlock after fork and failed exec. (bnc 493152) - No need to manually detect the location of aria2 binary. - version 6.11.4 (11)

- Remove confusing newlines in vendor change info (bnc #503859) - Removing a package lock was not counted as state change (bnc #501850) - Take solver_allowVendorChange option into account when computing the Selectables default candidate. - version 6.12.0 (11)
- New Resolver::addUpgradeRepo to perform a dist upgrade restricted to certain repositories. - version 6.13.0 (11)

- Provide class CheckAccessDeleted and command zypp-CheckAccessDeleted to check for running processes which access meanwhile deleted files or libraries. This may be used after commit, when trying to figure out which services need to be restated. (fate #300763). - version 6.13.1 (11)
- Tune CheckAccessDeleted to focus on libraries and executables. - version 6.13.2 (11)
- package-manager script: do not fail if kpackagekit is not installed (bnc #529510) - version 6.13.3 (11)
- package-manager script: Fall back to package selection if no packages are passed on the commandline. (bnc #529137)
- Fix PoolQuery comparison (bnc #528755) - Fix serialization and restore of predicated PoolQueries. - version 6.14.0 (11)
- Lock rpms architecture only on distupgrade of the running system. (bnc #458520) - version 6.14.2 (11)
- Fix resolution to force installation even if dependencies are missing. (bnc #531564) - Rephrase solver resolution to point out if a package will break. (bnc #520083)
- Add Capability::guessPackageSpec; parser also supporting "name-ver-rel.arch" formats for building Capabilities(originally "name.arch=ver-rel"). - version 6.14.3 (11)
- Support nfs4 (nfs4://... or nfs://...?type=nfs4) (fate #306451) - Added Url::schemeIsLocal, schemeIsRemote, schemeIsVolatile and schemeIsDownloading. - version 6.15.0 (11)
- New commit.downloadMode option in zypp.conf. Allows to set a prefered download policy for commit. - version 6.16.0 (11)
- Make sure rpmReadConfigFiles was called before using librpm (bnc #539603). - Remove dead rpm database caching code from class RpmDb. - version 6.17.0 (17)
- Add Selectable::updateCandidateObj returning the candidate for update, if there is one. The updateCandidate must not violate any active solver policy. - version 6.17.1 (17)
- Add zypp.conf option update.messages.notify: Command to be invoked to send update messages. (fate #301175) - version 6.17.2 (17)

- Return update messages via ZYppCommitResult. Support variable substitution in notification command. (fate #301175) - Fix evaluation of no_proxy entries (bnc #543337) - aria/curl: Fix header data in case the target is not initialized when downloading. - version 6.18.0 (17)

- Performing a dist upgrade the solver may try to delete old and no longer provided (dropped) packages, even if they do not cause any dependency problem. This behaviour may be trurned off via zypp.conf option solver.upgradeRemoveDropedPackages. (bnc #539543) - New zypp.conf option solver.upgradeRemoveDropedPackages (true). - Add Product::droplist: List of dropped packages, i.e. packages no longer provided by a product. - version 6.18.1 (17)

- aria2: pass credentials in a file instead of the command line which is logged. - aria2: we get the url in the progress if there is no response from the server yet, handle that to avoid flooding the log. - version 6.18.2 (17)

- ResStatus: add isOrphaned to test whether a package is not provided by any enabled repository. Orphaned packages are usually good candidates for cleanup unless the providing repository was intentionally disabled. - version 6.19.0 (19)
- Repository::setInfo: Propagate priority changes to the solver to avoid reloading the whole repo (bnc #498266). - version 6.19.1 (19)

- Credentials are passed as commandline options to aria2c, so strip any 'user@' from the URL. Otherwise aria will use an empty password for this URL and authentication will fail. (bnc #544634) - version 6.19.2 (19)
- Fixes to make libzypp-bindings compile. - version 6.19.3 (19)
- Add Resolver::upgradingRepo demanded by GUI. (bnc #548551) - version 6.20.0 (19)

- New class PoolItemBest: Find the best candidates e.g. in a PoolQuery result. ui::Selectabe enhancements. Both will aid applications to install package sets determined by query results. (bnc # 548392) - Fix upgradeRepo solution to keep obsolete packages. (bnc #550915) - Updated iso3166-1 country codes (bnc #531350) - version 6.21.0 (19)
- Don't try to use an empty proxy string. (bnc #551314) - MediaSMB failed to pass the --workgroup option to mount. (bnc #547354) - version 6.21.1 (19)
- Don't try to access droplist of dropped products. (bnc #551697) - version 6.21.2 (19)
- CheckAccessDeleted: Avoid reporting false positive due to insufficient permission.
- CIFS/SMB: Support mountoption 'noguest' to prevent passing 'guest' option to mount. "cifs://server/share/path?mountoptions=noguest,ro" (bnc #547354) - version 6.21.3 (19)
- Enhance interface for zypper. (bnc #551956) - version 6.21.4 (19)
- dup: Process drop list only if product actually changes. (bnc #552180) - Selectable: Consider allowed arch/noarch changes when comuting candiadates. - version 6.22.0 (19)
- Following https redirections requires at least libcurl4-7.19.4. (bnc #553895)
- CheckAccessDeleted: Per default do not collect and report deleted files that outside bin and lib directories. 'zypper ps' reporting false positive seems to confuse. (bnc #554480)

- Raised the limit of redirections from 3 to 6 (bnc #465532) - Following redirections also for https (bnc #545722). - Following https redirections requires at least libcurl4-7.19.4. (bnc #553895) - Do not report cached packages as being downloaded. (bnc #545295) - Per default do not collect and report deleted files outside bin and lib directories for 'zypper ps'. (bnc #554480) - version 6.22.1 (19)

- Forward port and document already present changes from Code11-Branch * void SEGV if trying to access data of installed packages, that were deleted behind our back (bnc #530595) * ProxyInfoSysconfig: take care variables get initialized. * Fix parsing of rpm.install.excludedocs option (bnc #518883) * Use rpm variables in specfile. (bnc #512466) * Fix to compile with -Werror=format-security * Fix packageand() in testcase generation * Don't link unneeded libraries. (bnc #490895) * Fix Patch::categoryEnum. * Adapt to changed satsolver API. (bnc #480303) * Taking ALL translations for generating GMO files (bnc #458739) * Advice users to contact NCC if access to a 'novell.com' repository is denied (bnc #464586). - version 6.22.2 (19)
- Specfile fixes to build on sle11-sp1. - Fix repository probing and building in presence of productdir. (bnc #553712) - version 6.22.3 (19)
- Parse zypp.conf multiversion option and make the setting available in pool and resolver. - version 6.23.0 (19)
- Add ui::Selecatble interface for picking specific package versions to install or delete if multiversion install is on. - version 6.24.0 (19)
- Fixed parsing of download speed from aria2c (bnc #537870)
- Fix chroot execution of update scripts. (bnc #558813) - version 6.24.3 (19)
- Also parse <product> tag from .prod files <upgrade> section. - version 6.24.3 (19)
- Add Selectable::highestAvailableVersionObj. Returns the highest available package version, ignoring priorities and policies. (bnc #557557) - version 6.25.0 (19)
- PickList and status interface for handling packages which are installable in multiple versions. (fate #305311) - version 6.26.0 (19)
- Don't allow an alias to start with '.' (bnc #473834)
- Improve multiversion status handling and installation. (fate #305311) - version 6.27.0 (19)
- Fix transaction building in presence of multiversion installable items. - version 6.27.1 (19)
- RepoInfoBase::label() added for use in UI messages, plus ZConfig::repoLabelIsAlias()
- Set SignatureFileChecker context even if the key is not known (bnc #495977) - version 6.28.0 (19)
- Use regex to parse aria2c progress lines (bnc #570917) - version 6.28.1 (19)
- Evaluate SolvAttr::repositoryToolVersion to prevent loading outdated solv files. (bnc #570623) - version 6.29.0 (19)
- Abort aria2c download when the progress callback receives 'false' (bnc #545106)

- Remember the enabled state of removed service repositories. This way we are able to restore service repositories correctly after a subscrition expired and gets renewed. (bnc #572634) - version 6.29.2 (19)
- Support an alternate SLE-SP1 translation set. - version 6.29.3 (19)
- Fix package-manager script wrongly escaping UTF-8 chars in path names (bnc #571410) - version 6.29.4 (19)
- On SLE aria2 is not required, so conflict with a too old aria2 version installed. (bnc #578052) - version 6.29.5 (19)
- RepoManager::cleanCacheDirGarbage added for removing directories which do not belong to any of known repos (bnc #467693) - version 6.30.0 (19)
- Turn off cookies when retrieving services repoindex.xml (bnc #573897) - Consider pending disable requests when removing service repositories. (bnc #572634) - version 6.30.1 (19)
- Made CURLE_PARTIAL_FILE an auto-retry error (bnc #471436)
- Check if a downloaded file actually exists even if aria2c returned 0. (bnc #564816) - version 6.30.3 (19)
- Avoiding use of 'guest' if 'credentials' is used when moutning a CIFS share. This caused 'permission denied' error with certain server configurations (bnc #560496).
- Fix handling of symlinked packages in package cache. (bnc #585409) - version 6.30.5 (19)
- Fix broken bit values in enum VendorSupportOption (bnc#589331) - version 6.31.0 (31)
- Add static Target::distributionLabel to return the baseproducts shortName and summary. Mainlu used for the bootloader menu. (bnc #586303) - version 6.31.1 (31)
- Fix guessing package spec to match package names only. (bnc#590864) - version 6.31.2 (31)
- Propagate ZConfig::setTextLocale to pool. (bnc#588850) - version 6.31.3 (31)
- Fix parsing port from IPv6 URL (bnc#593385)
- Using boost-1.42 requires -fno-strict-aliasing (bnc#595545) - Bump major version for 11.3 development. - version 7.0.0 (0)
- Provide name of the lock holder in ZYppFactoryException. (bnc#580513) - version 7.1.0 (1)
- /etc/zypp/locks: Allow to specify edition ranges with solvable:name and dependencies. - version 7.1.1 (1)
- Update translations.
- Update translations.
- Support URLs and ISOs ending on 'Media1', 'Media2', etc., when rewiting the URL to access a specific media number. By now only nanmes ending on 'CD' or 'DVD' were supported. (bnc#594850)
- Use libudev to detect available cd/dvd devices (bnc#590707,fate#308980) - Fix specfile to BuildRequire libudev-devel. - version 7.2.0 (2)
- Selectable: Classify broken but locked patch as isUnwanted (bnc#577118) - version 7.3.0 (2)
- Update translations.
- Enable splitprovides on update.
- Update translations.

- Cleanup when deleting packages. New zypp.conf expert option solver.cleandepsOnRemove telling whether the solver should per default try to remove packages exclusively required by the ones he's asked to delete (default false). - Resolver::cleandepsOnRemove API to allow applications to change the solver option. - version 7.4.0 (4)
- Update translations.
- Update translations.
- Improve solver.cleandepsOnRemove result by evaluating the install history to find packages installed on behalf of a user request (not auto added by the solver). - version 7.5.0 (5)

package.name: libzypp-bindings
package.changelog: - New package with swig generated bindings for libzypp
- added Python bindings
- improved bindings for various classes - adoptions to libzypp changes
- added exceptions
- moved ruby files to vendor_ruby (bug #301127)
- renamed ruby module to zypp
- added some comparison functions
- added to_a functions
- added KeyRing and PublicKey classes
- some work on python bindings
- Fix broken compiler flags.
- generate Perl bindings - use ZYpp Url class
- don't generate a debuginfo package (bug #297711)
- fixed build in beta
- Add Pool iterator for python.
- readded cmp for ResObject
- fix build
- sat/repo moved to repository - Revision 8981 - version 0.4.5
- adapt to libzypp 4.5
- adapt to libzypp 4.7
- adapt to libzypp 4.10
- remove obsolete ResPool methods
- compile ruby
- Remove obsolete references to Script/Message/Atom. - Remove obsolete references to Dependencies.

- Removed almost all local copies of zypp header files. This also removed some old classes no longer present in libzypp. - Re-enabled building of python and perl bindings. (bnc #391831) - revision 10666 - version 0.4.6
- Work around undefined symbols in libzypp. (bnc #391831) - Adapt to zypp::Service being renamed to ServiceInfo - revision 10707 - version 0.4.7
- Remove obsolete TranslatedText - Add ProductInfo which is going to replace Product - revision 10716
- Remove ProductInfo. We don't replace Product. - revision 10799
- Added lost RepoInfo and ServiceInfo. - revision 10928
- Fix basic resolvabe attributes as needed by list_resolvables.py example. - revision 10952
- add ZConfig
- Add KeyRing::DefautAccept
- Fix makefile to build. - revision 11318
- Ignore Pathname operator<. - revision 11649
- Compile with -fPIC - revision 11945
- Bump factory version - version 0.5.0
- Fix specfile data.
- Adappt to boost-1.39 - version 0.5.1
- use new python macros
- Remove reference to dead zypp::ScanDBReport. - version 0.5.2
- Fix to build on sle11-sp1
- Pass python_sitelib macro from .spec file to cmake. - version 0.5.3
- Work around swig not understanding nested class.
- Adapt to swig 1.3.40 - version 0.5.4
- Update to 0.5.7
- Update to 0.5.8
- Support builtin arm architectures

package.name: libzypp-devel
package.changelog: - Adapt to changed satsolver API.

- aria2: implement speed indicators (bnc#475506) - aria2: implement progress indicators correctly (bnc#473846) - aria2: fix broken pipe when looking for aria2c which caused a fallback to curl. (bnc#480930) - aria2: implement saving and reading mirror stats data in /var/cache/zypp/aria2.stats - aria2: handle failover correctly (bnc#481115) - aria2: various improvements in error and report handling - aria2: curl: reset settings on attach to avoid duplicate headers - version 6.2.1 (2)
- zypp.conf: fixed and enabled 'servicesdir'
- Remove a lock if the locking process is in zombie state. (bnc #481577)
- aria2: show the download speed in the right unit - aria2: show the filename in progress, not the repository - aria2: don't show done twice
- Add Resolver::setSolveSrcPackages. Per default disable solving of source package dependencies. We will later allow to enable it per package. - version 6.3.0 (2)
- New zypp.conf option 'download.media_preference': Hint which media to prefer when installing packages (download vs. CD). - version 6.4.0 (2)
- Soft lock packages deleted on behalf of a user request. - version 6.4.1 (2)

- New classes wraping satsolver datamatcher (Match and sat::AttrMatcher) - Extend LookupAttr to support matching specific string patterns. - Rewrote PoolQuery::Iterator (adapt to AttrMatcher, fixes and speedup) - version 6.5.0 (5)
- In update repos providing multiple release package versions for the same product, link a product to the latest version. (bnc #497696)
- Improve problem report on broken systemCheck rule (bnc #475144)
- Detect and compile with rpm 4.7 (bnc #444211) - version 6.5.2 (5)
- Allow service refresh to change a repositories url (bnc #502157)
- Fix lost housekeeping data in modifyRepo (bnc #503207)
- New solver.allowVendorChange expert option in zypp.conf. - version 6.6.0 (6)
- Improve PoolQuery to allow queries on dependencies. (bnc #475682) - version 6.7.0 (6)
- Cleanup and remove deprecated interface methods. - version 6.8.0 (8)
- Fix solver to use IdSting to avoid failing vendor checks. - version 6.8.1 (8)
- Allow building libzypp without HAL (not recommended). Without HAL CD/DVD device detection is limited to /dev/dvd and /dev/cdrom. - version 6.8.2 (8)
- Allow building libzypp with rpm-5 (experimental) - version 6.8.3 (8)

- Enhance PoolQueryIterator to allow detailed inspection of attribute matches. - Prefer datadir stored as repo attribute, but fallback searching in solvbales (old solv files do this). - version 6.9.0 (8)
- Enhance LookupAttr to allow direct query of attributes within sub-structures (flexarrays).
- Running as non-root user use a temporary @System solvfile in case the global one is outdated and needed refresh. (bnc #517183) - version 6.9.1 (8)
- Support PoolQuery for sub-structures attributes. (fate #305503) - version 6.9.2 (8)
- Adapt to satsolvers improved dataiterator handling. - version 6.9.3 (8)
- When unmounting ISO images, don't mix up exceptions thrown by the loop mounted ISO and those thrown by the media containing it. (bnc #517856)
- Fix parsing of rpm.install.excludedocs option (bnc #518883)
- Fix HistoryLog to initialize on demand. - version 6.10.0 (10)
- Remove obsolete UpgradeStatistics class from libzypp.
- Adapt to boost_unit_test_framework-1.38. - version 6.10.1 (10)

- Support "product version" detection on systems not using /etc/product.d/baseproduct by looking for the first package providing ZConfig::distroverpkg (defaults to redhat-release). - version 6.10.2 (10)
- log redirections when cURL media backend is used (fate #305320).
- Add new string Match::Mode STRINGSTART and STRINGEND.
- Don't write a solver testcase when solving for dist upgrade, but when actually committing. - version 6.10.3 (10)
- New solver.upgradeTestcasesToKeep option in zypp.conf. It tells how many dist upgrade solver testcases should be kept on the system. Per default just the last two are kept. - version 6.10.4 (10)

- add support to the package-manager script to use kpackagekit or gnome-packagekit if available, which allows to install local rpms with one click from file manager following desktop policies and fetching other dependencies if required. (fate #306526) - version 6.10.5 (10)
- Add download policies to ZYppCommitPolicy, supporting DownloadOnly and DownloadInAdvance. (fate #302159, fate #305624) - version 6.11.0 (11)
- New class InstanceId to build strings to identify/retrieve specific Solvables. - version 6.11.1 (11)
- New misc::defaultLoadSystem: Convenience to create the ZYpp instance and load target and enabled repositories.
- Create LogControl on demand instead of using a static var. (bnc #525339) - version 6.11.2 (11)
- Fixed parsing of download rate report (changed in aria2 1.4.0) (bnc #513944)
- Avoid deadlock after fork and failed exec. (bnc 493152) - No need to manually detect the location of aria2 binary. - version 6.11.4 (11)

- Remove confusing newlines in vendor change info (bnc #503859) - Removing a package lock was not counted as state change (bnc #501850) - Take solver_allowVendorChange option into account when computing the Selectables default candidate. - version 6.12.0 (11)
- New Resolver::addUpgradeRepo to perform a dist upgrade restricted to certain repositories. - version 6.13.0 (11)

- Provide class CheckAccessDeleted and command zypp-CheckAccessDeleted to check for running processes which access meanwhile deleted files or libraries. This may be used after commit, when trying to figure out which services need to be restated. (fate #300763). - version 6.13.1 (11)
- Tune CheckAccessDeleted to focus on libraries and executables. - version 6.13.2 (11)
- package-manager script: do not fail if kpackagekit is not installed (bnc #529510) - version 6.13.3 (11)
- package-manager script: Fall back to package selection if no packages are passed on the commandline. (bnc #529137)
- Fix PoolQuery comparison (bnc #528755) - Fix serialization and restore of predicated PoolQueries. - version 6.14.0 (11)
- Lock rpms architecture only on distupgrade of the running system. (bnc #458520) - version 6.14.2 (11)
- Fix resolution to force installation even if dependencies are missing. (bnc #531564) - Rephrase solver resolution to point out if a package will break. (bnc #520083)
- Add Capability::guessPackageSpec; parser also supporting "name-ver-rel.arch" formats for building Capabilities(originally "name.arch=ver-rel"). - version 6.14.3 (11)
- Support nfs4 (nfs4://... or nfs://...?type=nfs4) (fate #306451) - Added Url::schemeIsLocal, schemeIsRemote, schemeIsVolatile and schemeIsDownloading. - version 6.15.0 (11)
- New commit.downloadMode option in zypp.conf. Allows to set a prefered download policy for commit. - version 6.16.0 (11)
- Make sure rpmReadConfigFiles was called before using librpm (bnc #539603). - Remove dead rpm database caching code from class RpmDb. - version 6.17.0 (17)
- Add Selectable::updateCandidateObj returning the candidate for update, if there is one. The updateCandidate must not violate any active solver policy. - version 6.17.1 (17)
- Add zypp.conf option update.messages.notify: Command to be invoked to send update messages. (fate #301175) - version 6.17.2 (17)

- Return update messages via ZYppCommitResult. Support variable substitution in notification command. (fate #301175) - Fix evaluation of no_proxy entries (bnc #543337) - aria/curl: Fix header data in case the target is not initialized when downloading. - version 6.18.0 (17)

- Performing a dist upgrade the solver may try to delete old and no longer provided (dropped) packages, even if they do not cause any dependency problem. This behaviour may be trurned off via zypp.conf option solver.upgradeRemoveDropedPackages. (bnc #539543) - New zypp.conf option solver.upgradeRemoveDropedPackages (true). - Add Product::droplist: List of dropped packages, i.e. packages no longer provided by a product. - version 6.18.1 (17)

- aria2: pass credentials in a file instead of the command line which is logged. - aria2: we get the url in the progress if there is no response from the server yet, handle that to avoid flooding the log. - version 6.18.2 (17)

- ResStatus: add isOrphaned to test whether a package is not provided by any enabled repository. Orphaned packages are usually good candidates for cleanup unless the providing repository was intentionally disabled. - version 6.19.0 (19)
- Repository::setInfo: Propagate priority changes to the solver to avoid reloading the whole repo (bnc #498266). - version 6.19.1 (19)

- Credentials are passed as commandline options to aria2c, so strip any 'user@' from the URL. Otherwise aria will use an empty password for this URL and authentication will fail. (bnc #544634) - version 6.19.2 (19)
- Fixes to make libzypp-bindings compile. - version 6.19.3 (19)
- Add Resolver::upgradingRepo demanded by GUI. (bnc #548551) - version 6.20.0 (19)

- New class PoolItemBest: Find the best candidates e.g. in a PoolQuery result. ui::Selectabe enhancements. Both will aid applications to install package sets determined by query results. (bnc # 548392) - Fix upgradeRepo solution to keep obsolete packages. (bnc #550915) - Updated iso3166-1 country codes (bnc #531350) - version 6.21.0 (19)
- Don't try to use an empty proxy string. (bnc #551314) - MediaSMB failed to pass the --workgroup option to mount. (bnc #547354) - version 6.21.1 (19)
- Don't try to access droplist of dropped products. (bnc #551697) - version 6.21.2 (19)
- CheckAccessDeleted: Avoid reporting false positive due to insufficient permission.
- CIFS/SMB: Support mountoption 'noguest' to prevent passing 'guest' option to mount. "cifs://server/share/path?mountoptions=noguest,ro" (bnc #547354) - version 6.21.3 (19)
- Enhance interface for zypper. (bnc #551956) - version 6.21.4 (19)
- dup: Process drop list only if product actually changes. (bnc #552180) - Selectable: Consider allowed arch/noarch changes when comuting candiadates. - version 6.22.0 (19)
- Following https redirections requires at least libcurl4-7.19.4. (bnc #553895)
- CheckAccessDeleted: Per default do not collect and report deleted files that outside bin and lib directories. 'zypper ps' reporting false positive seems to confuse. (bnc #554480)

- Raised the limit of redirections from 3 to 6 (bnc #465532) - Following redirections also for https (bnc #545722). - Following https redirections requires at least libcurl4-7.19.4. (bnc #553895) - Do not report cached packages as being downloaded. (bnc #545295) - Per default do not collect and report deleted files outside bin and lib directories for 'zypper ps'. (bnc #554480) - version 6.22.1 (19)

- Forward port and document already present changes from Code11-Branch * void SEGV if trying to access data of installed packages, that were deleted behind our back (bnc #530595) * ProxyInfoSysconfig: take care variables get initialized. * Fix parsing of rpm.install.excludedocs option (bnc #518883) * Use rpm variables in specfile. (bnc #512466) * Fix to compile with -Werror=format-security * Fix packageand() in testcase generation * Don't link unneeded libraries. (bnc #490895) * Fix Patch::categoryEnum. * Adapt to changed satsolver API. (bnc #480303) * Taking ALL translations for generating GMO files (bnc #458739) * Advice users to contact NCC if access to a 'novell.com' repository is denied (bnc #464586). - version 6.22.2 (19)
- Specfile fixes to build on sle11-sp1. - Fix repository probing and building in presence of productdir. (bnc #553712) - version 6.22.3 (19)
- Parse zypp.conf multiversion option and make the setting available in pool and resolver. - version 6.23.0 (19)
- Add ui::Selecatble interface for picking specific package versions to install or delete if multiversion install is on. - version 6.24.0 (19)
- Fixed parsing of download speed from aria2c (bnc #537870)
- Fix chroot execution of update scripts. (bnc #558813) - version 6.24.3 (19)
- Also parse <product> tag from .prod files <upgrade> section. - version 6.24.3 (19)
- Add Selectable::highestAvailableVersionObj. Returns the highest available package version, ignoring priorities and policies. (bnc #557557) - version 6.25.0 (19)
- PickList and status interface for handling packages which are installable in multiple versions. (fate #305311) - version 6.26.0 (19)
- Don't allow an alias to start with '.' (bnc #473834)
- Improve multiversion status handling and installation. (fate #305311) - version 6.27.0 (19)
- Fix transaction building in presence of multiversion installable items. - version 6.27.1 (19)
- RepoInfoBase::label() added for use in UI messages, plus ZConfig::repoLabelIsAlias()
- Set SignatureFileChecker context even if the key is not known (bnc #495977) - version 6.28.0 (19)
- Use regex to parse aria2c progress lines (bnc #570917) - version 6.28.1 (19)
- Evaluate SolvAttr::repositoryToolVersion to prevent loading outdated solv files. (bnc #570623) - version 6.29.0 (19)
- Abort aria2c download when the progress callback receives 'false' (bnc #545106)

- Remember the enabled state of removed service repositories. This way we are able to restore service repositories correctly after a subscrition expired and gets renewed. (bnc #572634) - version 6.29.2 (19)
- Support an alternate SLE-SP1 translation set. - version 6.29.3 (19)
- Fix package-manager script wrongly escaping UTF-8 chars in path names (bnc #571410) - version 6.29.4 (19)
- On SLE aria2 is not required, so conflict with a too old aria2 version installed. (bnc #578052) - version 6.29.5 (19)
- RepoManager::cleanCacheDirGarbage added for removing directories which do not belong to any of known repos (bnc #467693) - version 6.30.0 (19)
- Turn off cookies when retrieving services repoindex.xml (bnc #573897) - Consider pending disable requests when removing service repositories. (bnc #572634) - version 6.30.1 (19)
- Made CURLE_PARTIAL_FILE an auto-retry error (bnc #471436)
- Check if a downloaded file actually exists even if aria2c returned 0. (bnc #564816) - version 6.30.3 (19)
- Avoiding use of 'guest' if 'credentials' is used when moutning a CIFS share. This caused 'permission denied' error with certain server configurations (bnc #560496).
- Fix handling of symlinked packages in package cache. (bnc #585409) - version 6.30.5 (19)
- Fix broken bit values in enum VendorSupportOption (bnc#589331) - version 6.31.0 (31)
- Add static Target::distributionLabel to return the baseproducts shortName and summary. Mainlu used for the bootloader menu. (bnc #586303) - version 6.31.1 (31)
- Fix guessing package spec to match package names only. (bnc#590864) - version 6.31.2 (31)
- Propagate ZConfig::setTextLocale to pool. (bnc#588850) - version 6.31.3 (31)
- Fix parsing port from IPv6 URL (bnc#593385)
- Using boost-1.42 requires -fno-strict-aliasing (bnc#595545) - Bump major version for 11.3 development. - version 7.0.0 (0)
- Provide name of the lock holder in ZYppFactoryException. (bnc#580513) - version 7.1.0 (1)
- /etc/zypp/locks: Allow to specify edition ranges with solvable:name and dependencies. - version 7.1.1 (1)
- Update translations.
- Update translations.
- Support URLs and ISOs ending on 'Media1', 'Media2', etc., when rewiting the URL to access a specific media number. By now only nanmes ending on 'CD' or 'DVD' were supported. (bnc#594850)
- Use libudev to detect available cd/dvd devices (bnc#590707,fate#308980) - Fix specfile to BuildRequire libudev-devel. - version 7.2.0 (2)
- Selectable: Classify broken but locked patch as isUnwanted (bnc#577118) - version 7.3.0 (2)
- Update translations.
- Enable splitprovides on update.
- Update translations.

- Cleanup when deleting packages. New zypp.conf expert option solver.cleandepsOnRemove telling whether the solver should per default try to remove packages exclusively required by the ones he's asked to delete (default false). - Resolver::cleandepsOnRemove API to allow applications to change the solver option. - version 7.4.0 (4)
- Update translations.
- Update translations.
- Improve solver.cleandepsOnRemove result by evaluating the install history to find packages installed on behalf of a user request (not auto added by the solver). - version 7.5.0 (5)
- Update translations.
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2 (Revision: 54959)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2 (Revision: 54959)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Add methods to evaluate gpg geys expiration dates. - Export all rpmDb keys to the zypp trusted keyring in one go. - version 7.6.0 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Fix package-manager-su to support LXDE (Andrea Florio) (bnc#582235) - Cleanup spec file (Pavol Rusnak) - version 7.6.0 (6)
- Fix arch detection on sprac (bug #566291) - Arch: add sparc64v and sparcv9v and armv7l - RepoManager: refresh repo if last refresh is in the future (bnc#593617) - version 7.6.1 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Fix packages provided via delta rpm being placed in the wrong package cache (bnc#607583) - version 7.7.1 (6)
- Fix broken IdStringType comparison (bnc#607572) - version 7.7.2 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Fix default evaluation of recommendations of installed packages (bnc#605490) - version 7.7.3 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Prevent against daemons launched in rpm %%post, that do not close their filedescriptors. Original fix was accidentally reverted. (bnc#174548) - version 7.7.4 (6)
- Add missing Date constant declarations. - version 7.7.5 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Don't bloat logfile by logging install progess values.
- Respect zypp.conf policy settings when solving for update.
- Fix CURLOPT_MAX_RECV_SPEED_LARGE expecting a curl_off_t argument.
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Fix requirement to /usr/bin/uuidgen (bnc#613304)
- Add PoolQuery for name, edition AND architecture in one go. (bnc#614362) - version 7.8.0 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Bump heads major version after 11.3 branched away. - version 8.0.0 (0)

- Fix bug in PoolQuery::addDependency - Disable MediaAria and enable MultiCurl as default http/ftp backend. MultiCurl implements MetaLink and Zsync support using libcurl. In case of trouble set ZYPP_MULTICURL=0 in the envirionment to disable the new backend. - version 8.0.1 (0)
- Enhance PoolItem interface to assist patch classification. (bnc#627316) - version 8.1.0 (0)
- Fix memory leaks.
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- MediaDISK: Use blkid to verify disk volumes. (bnc#623226) - version 8.1.1 (0)
- fix basearch url variable - use the right release package name on fedora
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Fix download-only not to omit source packages (bnc#635596) - version 8.1.2 (0)
- Report download failures in commit result (bnc#431854) - Fix Solvable::onSystemByUser returning true for uninstalled solvables. - version 8.1.3 (0)
- fixed replacing basearch (for fedora systems) - (bnc#637473) - version 8.2.0 (0)
- Allow per repository proxy settings like yum does. Including setting it to _none_ overriding the system proxy. Patch from Zhang, Qiang <qiang.z.zhang@intel.com> - version 8.2.1 (0)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- fix metalink4 parsing [bnc#641484]
- fixed replacing releasever (for fedora systems) - (bnc#637470) - version 8.3.0 (0)
- Use DownloadInHeaps as default, when there is nothing configured and when the target root is set to "/". (bnc#591476) - version 8.4.0 (4)
- implementation for url resolver plugins - version 8.5.0 (5)
- Don't use aria2c for FTP (bnc #641328)
- fix services not being linked to their file after being saved
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Use timeouts in plugin script communication. - Fix ExternalProgram to correctly remember exit status. - version 8.6.0 (5)
- Make MetaLinkParser accept InputStreams - Make MetaLinkParser accept Pathnames insted of strings - Fix MetaLinkv4 hash parsing - Add MetaLinkParser test - version 8.7.0 (7)
- Feed the ProvideFilePolicy progress callback in addition to any connected media::DownloadProgressReport (bnc#545106) - version 8.7.1 (7)
- added metalink support - version 8.8.0 (7)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Add two more arches armv7nhl and armv7hl

- Fix resolution to force installation even if dependencies are missing. (bnc #531564) - Rephrase solver resolution to point out if a package will break. (bnc #520083)
- Add Capability::guessPackageSpec; parser also supporting "name-ver-rel.arch" formats for building Capabilities(originally "name.arch=ver-rel"). - version 6.14.3 (11)
- Support nfs4 (nfs4://... or nfs://...?type=nfs4) (fate #306451) - Added Url::schemeIsLocal, schemeIsRemote, schemeIsVolatile and schemeIsDownloading. - version 6.15.0 (11)
- New commit.downloadMode option in zypp.conf. Allows to set a prefered download policy for commit. - version 6.16.0 (11)
- Make sure rpmReadConfigFiles was called before using librpm (bnc #539603). - Remove dead rpm database caching code from class RpmDb. - version 6.17.0 (17)
- Add Selectable::updateCandidateObj returning the candidate for update, if there is one. The updateCandidate must not violate any active solver policy. - version 6.17.1 (17)
- Add zypp.conf option update.messages.notify: Command to be invoked to send update messages. (fate #301175) - version 6.17.2 (17)

- Return update messages via ZYppCommitResult. Support variable substitution in notification command. (fate #301175) - Fix evaluation of no_proxy entries (bnc #543337) - aria/curl: Fix header data in case the target is not initialized when downloading. - version 6.18.0 (17)

- Performing a dist upgrade the solver may try to delete old and no longer provided (dropped) packages, even if they do not cause any dependency problem. This behaviour may be trurned off via zypp.conf option solver.upgradeRemoveDropedPackages. (bnc #539543) - New zypp.conf option solver.upgradeRemoveDropedPackages (true). - Add Product::droplist: List of dropped packages, i.e. packages no longer provided by a product. - version 6.18.1 (17)

- aria2: pass credentials in a file instead of the command line which is logged. - aria2: we get the url in the progress if there is no response from the server yet, handle that to avoid flooding the log. - version 6.18.2 (17)

- ResStatus: add isOrphaned to test whether a package is not provided by any enabled repository. Orphaned packages are usually good candidates for cleanup unless the providing repository was intentionally disabled. - version 6.19.0 (19)
- Repository::setInfo: Propagate priority changes to the solver to avoid reloading the whole repo (bnc #498266). - version 6.19.1 (19)

- Credentials are passed as commandline options to aria2c, so strip any 'user@' from the URL. Otherwise aria will use an empty password for this URL and authentication will fail. (bnc #544634) - version 6.19.2 (19)
- Fixes to make libzypp-bindings compile. - version 6.19.3 (19)
- Add Resolver::upgradingRepo demanded by GUI. (bnc #548551) - version 6.20.0 (19)

- New class PoolItemBest: Find the best candidates e.g. in a PoolQuery result. ui::Selectabe enhancements. Both will aid applications to install package sets determined by query results. (bnc # 548392) - Fix upgradeRepo solution to keep obsolete packages. (bnc #550915) - Updated iso3166-1 country codes (bnc #531350) - version 6.21.0 (19)
- Don't try to use an empty proxy string. (bnc #551314) - MediaSMB failed to pass the --workgroup option to mount. (bnc #547354) - version 6.21.1 (19)
- Don't try to access droplist of dropped products. (bnc #551697) - version 6.21.2 (19)
- CheckAccessDeleted: Avoid reporting false positive due to insufficient permission.
- CIFS/SMB: Support mountoption 'noguest' to prevent passing 'guest' option to mount. "cifs://server/share/path?mountoptions=noguest,ro" (bnc #547354) - version 6.21.3 (19)
- Enhance interface for zypper. (bnc #551956) - version 6.21.4 (19)
- dup: Process drop list only if product actually changes. (bnc #552180) - Selectable: Consider allowed arch/noarch changes when comuting candiadates. - version 6.22.0 (19)
- Following https redirections requires at least libcurl4-7.19.4. (bnc #553895)
- CheckAccessDeleted: Per default do not collect and report deleted files that outside bin and lib directories. 'zypper ps' reporting false positive seems to confuse. (bnc #554480)

- Raised the limit of redirections from 3 to 6 (bnc #465532) - Following redirections also for https (bnc #545722). - Following https redirections requires at least libcurl4-7.19.4. (bnc #553895) - Do not report cached packages as being downloaded. (bnc #545295) - Per default do not collect and report deleted files outside bin and lib directories for 'zypper ps'. (bnc #554480) - version 6.22.1 (19)

- Forward port and document already present changes from Code11-Branch * void SEGV if trying to access data of installed packages, that were deleted behind our back (bnc #530595) * ProxyInfoSysconfig: take care variables get initialized. * Fix parsing of rpm.install.excludedocs option (bnc #518883) * Use rpm variables in specfile. (bnc #512466) * Fix to compile with -Werror=format-security * Fix packageand() in testcase generation * Don't link unneeded libraries. (bnc #490895) * Fix Patch::categoryEnum. * Adapt to changed satsolver API. (bnc #480303) * Taking ALL translations for generating GMO files (bnc #458739) * Advice users to contact NCC if access to a 'novell.com' repository is denied (bnc #464586). - version 6.22.2 (19)
- Specfile fixes to build on sle11-sp1. - Fix repository probing and building in presence of productdir. (bnc #553712) - version 6.22.3 (19)
- Parse zypp.conf multiversion option and make the setting available in pool and resolver. - version 6.23.0 (19)
- Add ui::Selecatble interface for picking specific package versions to install or delete if multiversion install is on. - version 6.24.0 (19)
- Fixed parsing of download speed from aria2c (bnc #537870)
- Fix chroot execution of update scripts. (bnc #558813) - version 6.24.3 (19)
- Also parse <product> tag from .prod files <upgrade> section. - version 6.24.3 (19)
- Add Selectable::highestAvailableVersionObj. Returns the highest available package version, ignoring priorities and policies. (bnc #557557) - version 6.25.0 (19)
- PickList and status interface for handling packages which are installable in multiple versions. (fate #305311) - version 6.26.0 (19)
- Don't allow an alias to start with '.' (bnc #473834)
- Improve multiversion status handling and installation. (fate #305311) - version 6.27.0 (19)
- Fix transaction building in presence of multiversion installable items. - version 6.27.1 (19)
- RepoInfoBase::label() added for use in UI messages, plus ZConfig::repoLabelIsAlias()
- Set SignatureFileChecker context even if the key is not known (bnc #495977) - version 6.28.0 (19)
- Use regex to parse aria2c progress lines (bnc #570917) - version 6.28.1 (19)
- Evaluate SolvAttr::repositoryToolVersion to prevent loading outdated solv files. (bnc #570623) - version 6.29.0 (19)
- Abort aria2c download when the progress callback receives 'false' (bnc #545106)

- Remember the enabled state of removed service repositories. This way we are able to restore service repositories correctly after a subscrition expired and gets renewed. (bnc #572634) - version 6.29.2 (19)
- Support an alternate SLE-SP1 translation set. - version 6.29.3 (19)
- Fix package-manager script wrongly escaping UTF-8 chars in path names (bnc #571410) - version 6.29.4 (19)
- On SLE aria2 is not required, so conflict with a too old aria2 version installed. (bnc #578052) - version 6.29.5 (19)
- RepoManager::cleanCacheDirGarbage added for removing directories which do not belong to any of known repos (bnc #467693) - version 6.30.0 (19)
- Turn off cookies when retrieving services repoindex.xml (bnc #573897) - Consider pending disable requests when removing service repositories. (bnc #572634) - version 6.30.1 (19)
- Made CURLE_PARTIAL_FILE an auto-retry error (bnc #471436)
- Check if a downloaded file actually exists even if aria2c returned 0. (bnc #564816) - version 6.30.3 (19)
- Avoiding use of 'guest' if 'credentials' is used when moutning a CIFS share. This caused 'permission denied' error with certain server configurations (bnc #560496).
- Fix handling of symlinked packages in package cache. (bnc #585409) - version 6.30.5 (19)
- Fix broken bit values in enum VendorSupportOption (bnc#589331) - version 6.31.0 (31)
- Add static Target::distributionLabel to return the baseproducts shortName and summary. Mainlu used for the bootloader menu. (bnc #586303) - version 6.31.1 (31)
- Fix guessing package spec to match package names only. (bnc#590864) - version 6.31.2 (31)
- Propagate ZConfig::setTextLocale to pool. (bnc#588850) - version 6.31.3 (31)
- Fix parsing port from IPv6 URL (bnc#593385)
- Using boost-1.42 requires -fno-strict-aliasing (bnc#595545) - Bump major version for 11.3 development. - version 7.0.0 (0)
- Provide name of the lock holder in ZYppFactoryException. (bnc#580513) - version 7.1.0 (1)
- /etc/zypp/locks: Allow to specify edition ranges with solvable:name and dependencies. - version 7.1.1 (1)
- Update translations.
- Update translations.
- Support URLs and ISOs ending on 'Media1', 'Media2', etc., when rewiting the URL to access a specific media number. By now only nanmes ending on 'CD' or 'DVD' were supported. (bnc#594850)
- Use libudev to detect available cd/dvd devices (bnc#590707,fate#308980) - Fix specfile to BuildRequire libudev-devel. - version 7.2.0 (2)
- Selectable: Classify broken but locked patch as isUnwanted (bnc#577118) - version 7.3.0 (2)
- Update translations.
- Enable splitprovides on update.
- Update translations.

- Cleanup when deleting packages. New zypp.conf expert option solver.cleandepsOnRemove telling whether the solver should per default try to remove packages exclusively required by the ones he's asked to delete (default false). - Resolver::cleandepsOnRemove API to allow applications to change the solver option. - version 7.4.0 (4)
- Update translations.
- Update translations.
- Improve solver.cleandepsOnRemove result by evaluating the install history to find packages installed on behalf of a user request (not auto added by the solver). - version 7.5.0 (5)
- Update translations.
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2 (Revision: 54959)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2 (Revision: 54959)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Add methods to evaluate gpg geys expiration dates. - Export all rpmDb keys to the zypp trusted keyring in one go. - version 7.6.0 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Fix package-manager-su to support LXDE (Andrea Florio) (bnc#582235) - Cleanup spec file (Pavol Rusnak) - version 7.6.0 (6)
- Fix arch detection on sprac (bug #566291) - Arch: add sparc64v and sparcv9v and armv7l - RepoManager: refresh repo if last refresh is in the future (bnc#593617) - version 7.6.1 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Fix packages provided via delta rpm being placed in the wrong package cache (bnc#607583) - version 7.7.1 (6)
- Fix broken IdStringType comparison (bnc#607572) - version 7.7.2 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Fix default evaluation of recommendations of installed packages (bnc#605490) - version 7.7.3 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Prevent against daemons launched in rpm %%post, that do not close their filedescriptors. Original fix was accidentally reverted. (bnc#174548) - version 7.7.4 (6)
- Add missing Date constant declarations. - version 7.7.5 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Don't bloat logfile by logging install progess values.
- Respect zypp.conf policy settings when solving for update.
- Fix CURLOPT_MAX_RECV_SPEED_LARGE expecting a curl_off_t argument.
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Fix requirement to /usr/bin/uuidgen (bnc#613304)
- Add PoolQuery for name, edition AND architecture in one go. (bnc#614362) - version 7.8.0 (6)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Bump heads major version after 11.3 branched away. - version 8.0.0 (0)

- Fix bug in PoolQuery::addDependency - Disable MediaAria and enable MultiCurl as default http/ftp backend. MultiCurl implements MetaLink and Zsync support using libcurl. In case of trouble set ZYPP_MULTICURL=0 in the envirionment to disable the new backend. - version 8.0.1 (0)
- Enhance PoolItem interface to assist patch classification. (bnc#627316) - version 8.1.0 (0)
- Fix memory leaks.
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- MediaDISK: Use blkid to verify disk volumes. (bnc#623226) - version 8.1.1 (0)
- fix basearch url variable - use the right release package name on fedora
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Fix download-only not to omit source packages (bnc#635596) - version 8.1.2 (0)
- Report download failures in commit result (bnc#431854) - Fix Solvable::onSystemByUser returning true for uninstalled solvables. - version 8.1.3 (0)
- fixed replacing basearch (for fedora systems) - (bnc#637473) - version 8.2.0 (0)
- Allow per repository proxy settings like yum does. Including setting it to _none_ overriding the system proxy. Patch from Zhang, Qiang <qiang.z.zhang@intel.com> - version 8.2.1 (0)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- fix metalink4 parsing [bnc#641484]
- fixed replacing releasever (for fedora systems) - (bnc#637470) - version 8.3.0 (0)
- Use DownloadInHeaps as default, when there is nothing configured and when the target root is set to "/". (bnc#591476) - version 8.4.0 (4)
- implementation for url resolver plugins - version 8.5.0 (5)
- Don't use aria2c for FTP (bnc #641328)
- fix services not being linked to their file after being saved
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Use timeouts in plugin script communication. - Fix ExternalProgram to correctly remember exit status. - version 8.6.0 (5)
- Make MetaLinkParser accept InputStreams - Make MetaLinkParser accept Pathnames insted of strings - Fix MetaLinkv4 hash parsing - Add MetaLinkParser test - version 8.7.0 (7)
- Feed the ProvideFilePolicy progress callback in addition to any connected media::DownloadProgressReport (bnc#545106) - version 8.7.1 (7)
- added metalink support - version 8.8.0 (7)
- Update zypp-po.tar.bz2
- Add two more arches armv7nhl and armv7hl

package.name: meego-app-compliance-tools
package.changelog: - initial import
- 0.4 release and split the rpm to three ones: meego-compliance-tools (common) meego-dist-compliance-tools meego-app-compliance-tools
- new release 0.5 based on the initial implementation using shell
- new release 0.6 with new implementation by python scripts
- new release 1.0

- new release 1.1, with following changes: - Target and Reference image can accept unpacked directory as the input - App checker(app_comliance) added several new checkings, including - Separate API compatibility package list supported - Reference image can be in tar.bz2 image - Several minor bugs for special cases were fixed - Many code were refactored to be more stable and clean
- Get the right path from the path information to fix bmc#12526
- merge upstream code - bug fix for tar.next which will ignore previous files - new feature to delete intermediate log of dist compliance - adjust the tar process to get the root dir
- upgrade to 1.2 - Add the config files for 1.1 and 1.2 - Change to official release config files for 1.1 and 1.2

package.name: meego-osc-plugins
package.changelog: - Initial add to moblin
- Update plugins mobsr/unmobsr for compatibility for osc-0.124
- Update mobaccept/mobdecline for compatibility for osc-0.124
- Changed source tarball to gzip format for deb creating
- Added several other plugins from YangYi and me
- added one new plugin mobcheckreq and other fixings
- Rename package name to meego-osc-plugins Upgrade the version to 0.6
- Enable multi-distro building in OBS
- Fixed rpmlint errors

- added one new plugin localcheckbuild - Merged fixings in resolvedeps plugin:support multiple repos; use a stub if the package doesn't have source rpm; selected the best one if multi-packages provide one require
- Fixed the repourllist in localcheckbuild plugin
- Disable proxy cache to fix occasional repomd.xml download error
- Add repo/arch check for localcheckbuild plugi (BMC #11195) - Add repo arg for user configs the specified repo (BMC #11195)

package.name: meego-packaging-tools
package.changelog: - First packaging
- spectacle it and add Makefile
* Wed Dec 30 2009 Peter Zhu <peter.j.zhu@intel.com> - 0.1 - Update version of dependency packages
- Build with opensuse
- Add debian support
- Update to 0.4
- Update to 0.5
- build with debian
- Do not require plugins for now
- require plugins again - Depends on 0.2 of plugins
- Don't use SCM instruction in yaml file
- Use SCM and Archive diretive in yaml file - Remove dependency to rpmlint for debian building
- Require meego-osc-plugins
- Fixed dependencies on meego-osc-plugins
- Fixed %{moblin|meego_osc_plugins_version} macro name typo
- Update to 0.5.1 to clean up author and license info
- Rename package name to meego-packaging-tools
- Upgrade to 0.6 with the following changes: - Re-add spec-cleaner - Enhanced 'vc' command to work with 'osc vc' - Remove 'vi' specific options in 'vc' command - Other fixings
